sourcesContent:
import {ReactComponent as LogoIcon} from './assets/logo_icon.svg'
import Menu from './Menu'

const Navigation = ({className, navigation}) => {

  const {menus} = navigation

  const currentClassName = className
    ? `${className}__nav`
    : 'nav'
  const childClassName = className
    ? className
    : currentClassName

  return (
    <nav className={currentClassName}>     
      <button
        data-btn="root"
        className={`${className}__logo`}
    >
      {position === 'header'         
        ? <LogoHeaderIcon/>           
        : <LogoFooterIcon/>
      }
    </button>
      
      <LogoIcon/>
      {menus && (
          <Menu 
            className={childClassName} 
            menus={menus}              
          />
      )}      
    </nav>
  )
}

export default Navigation
